lead_paragraph: Questions are being raised over the Fox Business Network’s failure to disclose the News Corporation’s $1.3 million donation to defeat Proposition 24.
snippet: Questions are being raised over the Fox Business Network’s failure to disclose the News Corporation’s $1.3 million donation to defeat Proposition 24.

headline.main: A Donation Clouds Fox News Report
headline.seo: News Corp. Donation Clouds Fox Coverage of Prop. 24
headline.print_headline: A Donation Clouds Fox News Report
